WorkItem.ClosedComment: Current versions of Rawr3 are showing Defense Rating, so closing this.
WorkItem.Description:
When looking at Relative Stat Values for a DK Tank, "Defense" is not listed nor (apparently) given a value. Even if Defense is at or above the uncritable amount, there is still a benefit to Defense, so it should have a value.
 
Steps to reproduce:
Load from Armory: "Wyntyr" from "Sisters of Elune" server
Select "Stat Values => Relative Stat Values" from drop down menu
Look for Defense....
 
Additional Info
Rawr Version unknown (Can't find it...) but using the online version
Web Browser: Firefox 3.6.3 for Mac (OS 10.6.3)
WorkItem.Summary: [TankDK] Defense not listed in Relative Stat Values

Comments.Message:
Are you looking for Defense or Defense Rating?
Also this looks like Rawr3 - are you seeing this w/ Rawr 2?  (I realize on a mac, you may not get rawr2 to work.)

I am looking for Defense Rating - the Defense Skill *does* show up in the list of stats in the summary area (in the middle of the 'paper doll' area) and it correctly reflects my gear there. I am trying to see how 1 point in Defense Rating compares to, say 1 point of Stamina, or Agility, or.... One question I have is if the relative value of Defense Rating is just not listed or if it is not being considered at all in the optimization routines. 

Also - you are correct, I cannot get Rawr 2 to work on my Mac, so I only know of this on Rawr 3. If I get a chance, I will find a PC and check this with Rawr 2.
I did a quick check on the live version of Rawr 3.  And yeah, it's not there.  But it is showing up on Rawr2.  I'll look into it.  I've been slacking in my Rawr3 work anyhow.
